Control Statement: The organization: (a)   Employs automated mechanisms to schedule, conduct, and document maintenance and repairs; and (b)   Produces up-to date, accurate, and complete records of all maintenance and repair actions requested, scheduled, in process, and completed.Supplemental Guidance:  Related controls: CA-7, MA-3.References:  None.
